text: Takuma Koga (born April 16, 1977) is a Japanese professional stock car racing driver. He currently competes full-time in the NASCAR K&N; Pro Series West, driving the No. 77 Toyota Camry for Performance P-1 Motorsports. Koga began his time in NASCAR in 2001 with the NASCAR Northwest Series, where he appeared in five races while failing to qualify for one. After competing in partial K&N; West Series schedules between 2002 and 2016, Koga ran his first full season in 2017. He scored a career best fifth place finish at Orange Show Speedway in 2017. In December 2018, Koga announced he would be joining Performance P-1 Motorsports for the 2019 NASCAR K&N; Pro Series West season. ==Motorsports career results== ===ARCA Menards Series=== (key) (Bold – Pole position awarded by qualifying time.
